Question
========

Below is output from SPSS regarding a correlation analysis.

  ---- --------------------- ------- ------- X1 X2 X1 Pearson Correlation 1,000 .554 Sig.(2-tailed) .032 N 15 15 X2 Pearson Correlation .554 1,000 Sig.(2-tailed) .032 N 15 15 ---- --------------------- ------- -------

What is the percentage of total variation that Xl and X2 have in common?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.1%
* 3.2%
* 30.7%
* 55.4%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.1%: Incorrect
* 3.2%: Incorrect
* 30.7%: Correct
* 55.4%: Incorrect
